name: demo-project-gantt
description: A project management component with a table and a gantt chart.

rowData.description: The oj.DataProvider for the rows of the project, used by both the gantt and the table. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'row-data' attribute.

dependencyData.description: The oj.DataProvider for the dependency lines of the gantt. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'dependency-data' attribute.

columns.description: An array of table column definitions. Equivalent to oj-table's 'columns' attribute.

majorAxis.description: An object defining the major time axis of the gantt.

default.description: A converter used to format all scales that do not have a converter object provided.

seconds.description: A converter used to format the 'seconds' scale.

minutes.description: A converter used to format the 'minutes' scale.

hours.description: A converter used to format the 'hours' scale.

days.description: A converter used to format the 'days' scale.

weeks.description: A converter used to format the 'weeks' scale.

months.description: A converter used to format the 'months' scale.

quarters.description: A converter used to format the 'quarters' scale.

years.description: A converter used to format the 'years' scale.

height.description: The height of the major axis in pixels. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'major-axis.height' attribute.

scale.description: The time scale used for the major axis. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'major-axis.scale' attribute.

zoomOrder.description: An array of strings containing the names of scales used for zooming from longest to shortest. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'major-axis.zoom-order' attribute.

minorAxis.description: An object defining the minor time axis of the gantt.

default.description: A converter used to format all scales that do not have a converter object provided.

seconds.description: A converter used to format the 'seconds' scale.

minutes.description: A converter used to format the 'minutes' scale.

hours.description: A converter used to format the 'hours' scale.

days.description: A converter used to format the 'days' scale.

weeks.description: A converter used to format the 'weeks' scale.

months.description: A converter used to format the 'months' scale.

quarters.description: A converter used to format the 'quarters' scale.

years.description: A converter used to format the 'years' scale.

height.description: The height of the minor axis in pixels. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'minor-axis.height' attribute.

scale.description: The time scale used for the minor axis. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'minor-axis.scale' attribute.

zoomOrder.description: An array of strings containing the names of scales used for zooming from longest to shortest. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'minor-axis.zoom-order' attribute.

start.description: The start time of the gantt in ISO string format. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'start' attribute.

end.description: The end time of the gantt in ISO string format. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'end' attribute.

viewportStart.description: The viewport start of the gantt in ISO string format. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'viewport-start' attribute.

viewportEnd.description: The viewport end of the gantt in ISO string format. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'viewport-end' attribute.

referenceObjects.description: The array of reference objects associated with the Gantt. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'reference-objects' attribute.

gridlines.description: An object defining the minor time axis of the gantt.

horizontal.description: Horizontal gridlines visibility. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'gridlines.horizontal' attribute.

vertical.description: Vertical gridlines visibility. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'gridlines.vertical' attribute.

rowDefaults.description: An object defining the default styling for rows.

height.description: The height of the row in pixels.

expanded.description: The key set containing the ids of tasks that should be expanded. Equivalent to oj-gantt's 'expanded' attribute.

tableRowTemplate.description: Slot for stamping out oj-table rows. Use this slot the same way as using oj-table's rowTemplate slot.

ganttRowTemplate.description: Slot for creating each row of the gantt. Use this slot the same way as using oj-gantt's rowMappingTemplate slot.

ganttTaskTemplate.description: Slot for creating each task of the gantt. Use this slot the same way as using oj-gantt's taskMappingTemplate slot.

ganttDependencyTemplate.description: Slot for creating each dependency line of the gantt. Use this slot the same way as using oj-gantt's dependencyTemplate slot.
